# Madhav Bhatia — Analytics & Product Expert

> Madhav Bhatia is a Customer Insights & Analytics professional with 7+
> years of experience across LatentView Analytics and OYO. He holds a
> Master of Science in Business Analytics (4.0 GPA) from the University
> at Buffalo, SUNY, and certifications in Microsoft Fabric, Azure Data
> Science, Power BI, and Google Analytics. He is a Certified
> ScrumMaster (CSM) and co-inventor of a patented IoT-based industrial
> energy monitoring system (issued 2023). His expertise spans A/B
> testing, machine learning, NLP, marketing mix modeling, ETL pipeline
> design, and cloud data engineering across Azure, AWS, and Oracle Cloud.

## Projects

- [Random Fact Joke Generator](https://github.com/MAdhavbhatia222/llm_projects/tree/main/Joke_Generator): Production-deployed LLM application — Flask API on Oracle Cloud for real-time content generation
- [Anime Recommender System](https://github.com/MAdhavbhatia222/Anime_Recommender/tree/main): End-to-end ML pipeline — ETL (Talend), Oracle ADW, Docker, Oracle Compute
- [EduTask](https://github.com/MAdhavbhatia222/Edutask_Chatgpt/tree/main): RAG application using LangChain, vector databases, and Unstructured API for syllabus intelligence
- [MavenToys Dashboard](https://github.com/MAdhavbhatia222/Excel_Dashboards/tree/main): Multi-dimensional Excel dashboard for regional revenue and store performance analytics
- [LinkedIn Data Analysis](https://github.com/MAdhavbhatia222/Linkedin_Scrap_Py/tree/main): Python web intelligence pipeline — Selenium, BeautifulSoup, NLTK for labor market NLP analysis
- [Olympic Data Exploration](https://github.com/MAdhavbhatia222/SQL_Projects/blob/main/Olympic_Data_Exploration): Advanced SQL analysis with window functions across decades of Olympic data
- [Credit Card Data Analysis](https://github.com/MAdhavbhatia222/SQL_Projects/blob/main/Credit_Card_Usage): SQL-driven financial analytics — transaction pattern analysis and consumer behavior insights

## Certifications

- Microsoft Certified: Fabric Analytics Engineer Associate
- Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate
- Microsoft Certified: Power BI Data Analyst Associate
- Google Analytics Certification
- Certified ScrumMaster (CSM)
- Product Analytics Micro-Certification (Product School)
